mapper.update: update t_region set region_Name = #{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_Min_Consume = #{regionMinConsume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, region_Max_Consumer = #{regionMaxConsumer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_Flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where region_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select region_ID, region_Name, region_Min_Consume, region_Max_Consumer, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy from t_region where region_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select region_ID, region_Name, region_Min_Consume, region_Max_Consumer, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy from t_region
